verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of two full <S%H3117><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> that Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> dreamed: <S%H2492><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he stood <S%H5975><s%> by the river. <S%H2975><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H5927><s%> up out of the river <S%H2975><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> well <S%H3303><s%> favored <S%H4758><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> and fat; <S%H1277><s%> and they fed <S%H7462><s%> in a meadow. <S%H260><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them out of the river, <S%H2975><s%> ill <S%H7451><s%> favored <S%H4758><s%> and skinney; <S%H1851><s%> <S%H1320><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> by the other cows <S%H6510><s%> on the brink <S%H8193><s%> of the river. <S%H2975><s%>

And the ill <S%H7451><s%> favored <S%H4758><s%> and skinney <S%H1851><s%> <S%H1320><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> up the seven <S%H7651><s%> well <S%H3303><s%> favored <S%H4758><s%> and fat <S%H1277><s%> cows. <S%H6510><s%> So Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> awoke. <S%H3364><s%>

And he slept <S%H3462><s%> and dreamed <S%H2492><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time: and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> of corn came <S%H5927><s%> up on one <S%H259><s%> stalk, <S%H7070><s%> rank <S%H1277><s%> and good. <S%H2896><s%>
And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> thin <S%H1851><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> and blasted <S%H7710><s%> with the east <S%H6921><s%> wind sprung <S%H6779><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them.

And the seven thin <S%H1851><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> devoured <S%H1104><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> rank <S%H1277><s%> and full <S%H4392><s%> ears. <S%H7641><s%> And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> awoke, <S%H3364><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was a dream. <S%H2472><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the morning <S%H1242><s%> that his spirit <S%H7307><s%> was troubled; <S%H6470><s%> and he sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%> men thereof: and Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> them his dream; <S%H2472><s%> but there was none <S%H369><s%> that could interpret <S%H6622><s%> them to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>
Then spoke <S%H1696><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> butler <S%H4945><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I do remember <S%H2142><s%> my faults <S%H2399><s%> this day: <S%H3117><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> with his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> me in ward <S%H4929><s%> in the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard's <S%H2876><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> both me and the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker: <S%H644><s%>

And we dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> I and he; we dreamed <S%H2492><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> according to the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> of his dream. <S%H2472><s%>

And there <S%H8033><s%> was there with us a young <S%H5288><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> an Hebrew, <S%H5680><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> to the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard; <S%H2876><s%> and we told <S%H5608><s%> him, and he interpreted <S%H6622><s%> to us our dreams; <S%H2472><s%> to each man <S%H376><s%> according to his dream <S%H2472><s%> he did interpret. <S%H6622><s%>
And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as he interpreted <S%H6622><s%> to us, so <S%H3651><s%> it was; me he restored <S%H7725><s%> to my office, <S%H3653><s%> and him he hanged. <S%H8518><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and they brought <S%H7323><s%> him hastily <S%H7323><s%> out of the dungeon: <S%H953><s%> and he shaved <S%H1548><s%> himself, and changed <S%H2498><s%> his raiment, <S%H8071><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> in to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> I have dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> that can interpret <S%H6622><s%> it: and I have heard <S%H8085><s%> say <S%H559><s%> of you, that you can understand <S%H8085><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> to interpret <S%H6622><s%> it.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> It is not in me: God <S%H430><s%> shall give Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> an answer <S%H6030><s%> of peace. <S%H7965><s%>
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> In my dream, <S%H2472><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> I stood <S%H5975><s%> on the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river: <S%H2975><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H5927><s%> up out of the river <S%H2975><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> cows, <S%H6510><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> and well <S%H3303><s%> favored; <S%H8389><s%> and they fed <S%H7462><s%> in a meadow: <S%H260><s%>

And the lean <S%H7534><s%> and the ill <S%H7451><s%> favored cows <S%H6510><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> up the first <S%H7223><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> fat <S%H1277><s%> cows: <S%H6510><s%>

And when they had eaten <S%H935><s%> them up, it could not be known <S%H3045><s%> that they had eaten <S%H935><s%> them; but they were still ill <S%H7451><s%> favored, as at the beginning. <S%H8462><s%> So I awoke. <S%H3364><s%>

And I saw <S%H7200><s%> in my dream, <S%H2472><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up in one <S%H259><s%> stalk, <S%H7070><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> and good: <S%H2896><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ears, <S%H7641><s%> withered, <S%H6798><s%> thin, <S%H1851><s%> and blasted <S%H7710><s%> with the east <S%H6921><s%> wind, sprung <S%H6779><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them:

And the thin <S%H1851><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> devoured <S%H1104><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> ears: <S%H7641><s%> and I told <S%H559><s%> this to the magicians; <S%H2748><s%> but there was none <S%H369><s%> that could declare <S%H5046><s%> it to me.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> The dream <S%H2472><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> is one: <S%H259><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has showed <S%H5046><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> he is about to do. <S%H6213><s%>

The seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> and the seven <S%H7651><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> are seven <S%H7651><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> the dream <S%H2472><s%> is one. <S%H259><s%>

And the seven <S%H7651><s%> thin <S%H7534><s%> and ill <S%H7451><s%> favored cows <S%H6510><s%> that came <S%H5927><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them are seven <S%H7651><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> and the seven <S%H7651><s%> empty <S%H7386><s%> ears <S%H7641><s%> blasted <S%H7710><s%> with the east <S%H6921><s%> wind shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine. <S%H7458><s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> What <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is about to do <S%H6213><s%> he shows <S%H7200><s%> to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there come <S%H935><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of great <S%H1419><s%> plenty <S%H7647><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

And there shall arise <S%H6965><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine; <S%H7458><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the plenty <S%H7647><s%> shall be forgotten <S%H7911><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> shall consume <S%H3615><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%>

And the plenty <S%H7647><s%> shall not be known <S%H3045><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of that famine <S%H7458><s%> following; <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> for it shall be very <S%H3966><s%> grievous. <S%H3515><s%>

And for that the dream <S%H2472><s%> was doubled <S%H8138><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> twice; <S%H6471><s%> it is because <S%H3588><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> by God, <S%H430><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> will shortly <S%H4116><s%> bring <S%H6213><s%> it to pass. <S%H6213><s%>

Now therefore let Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> look <S%H7200><s%> out a man <S%H376><s%> discreet <S%H995><s%> and wise, <S%H2450><s%> and set <S%H7896><s%> him over <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Let Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this, and let him appoint <S%H6485><s%> officers <S%H6496><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and take up the fifth <S%H2567><s%> part of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in the seven <S%H7651><s%> plenteous <S%H7647><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And let them gather <S%H6908><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the food <S%H400><s%> of those <S%H428><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> that come, <S%H935><s%> and lay <S%H6651><s%> up corn <S%H1250><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and let them keep <S%H8104><s%> food <S%H400><s%> in the cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And that food <S%H400><s%> shall be for store <S%H6487><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> against the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine, <S%H7458><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> that the land <S%H776><s%> perish <S%H3772><s%> not through the famine. <S%H7458><s%>
And the thing <S%H1697><s%> was good <S%H3190><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servants, <S%H5650><s%> Can we find <S%H4672><s%> such a one as this <S%H2088><s%> is, a man <S%H376><s%> in whom <S%H834><s%> the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is?

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> For as much <S%H310><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> has showed <S%H3045><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> so discreet <S%H995><s%> and wise <S%H2450><s%> as you are:

You shall be over <S%H5921><s%> my house, <S%H1004><s%> and according <S%H5921><s%> to your word <S%H6310><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> be ruled: <S%H5401><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> in the throne <S%H3678><s%> will I be greater <S%H1431><s%> than you.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> you over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> took <S%H5493><s%> off his ring <S%H2885><s%> from his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and arrayed <S%H3847><s%> him in clothing <S%H899><s%> of fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> a gold <S%H2091><s%> chain <S%H7242><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> his neck; <S%H6677><s%>

And he made him to ride <S%H7392><s%> in the second <S%H4932><s%> chariot <S%H4818><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had; and they cried <S%H7121><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, Bow <S%H86><s%> the knee: and he made <S%H5414><s%> him ruler over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> I am Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and without <S%H1107><s%> you shall no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> lift <S%H7311><s%> up his hand <S%H3027><s%> or foot <S%H7272><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> Zaphnathpaaneah; <S%H6847><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> him to wife <S%H802><s%> Asenath <S%H621><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Potipherah <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On. <S%H204><s%> And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out over <S%H5921><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and went <S%H5674><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
And in the seven <S%H7651><s%> plenteous <S%H7647><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> brought <S%H6213><s%> forth <S%H6213><s%> by handfuls. <S%H7062><s%>

And he gathered <S%H6908><s%> up all <S%H3605><s%> the food <S%H400><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and laid <S%H5414><s%> up the food <S%H400><s%> in the cities: <S%H5892><s%> the food <S%H400><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was round <S%H5439><s%> about every city, <S%H5892><s%> laid <S%H5414><s%> he up in the same.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gathered <S%H6651><s%> corn <S%H1250><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> much, <S%H7235><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he left <S%H2308><s%> numbering; <S%H5608><s%> for it was without <S%H369><s%> number. <S%H4557><s%>

And to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Asenath <S%H621><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Potipherah <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On <S%H204><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to him.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> For God, <S%H430><s%> said he, has made me forget <S%H5382><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my toil, <S%H5999><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> my father's <S%H1><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> he Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> For God <S%H430><s%> has caused me to be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of my affliction. <S%H6040><s%>
And the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of plenty, <S%H7647><s%> that was in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> were ended. <S%H3615><s%>

And the seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of dearth <S%H7458><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to come, <S%H935><s%> according as Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had said: <S%H559><s%> and the dearth <S%H7458><s%> was in all <S%H3605><s%> lands; <S%H776><s%> but in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> there was bread. <S%H3899><s%>

And when all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was famished, <S%H7456><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> for bread: <S%H3899><s%> and Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> Go <S%H3212><s%> to Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> what <S%H834><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to you, do. <S%H6213><s%>

And the famine <S%H7458><s%> was over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the storehouses, <S%H834><s%> and sold <S%H7666><s%> to the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> waxed sore <S%H2388><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> countries <S%H776><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%> for to buy <S%H7666><s%> corn; because <S%H3588><s%> that the famine <S%H7458><s%> was so sore <S%H2388><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> lands. <S%H776><s%>
